p: Severe acute respiratory syndrome-coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus that has been introduced as the first pandemic of the century since its first detection in late December 2019 in China ( 1). The disease is named coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and manifests with dyspnea, fever, cough, myalgia, and other flu-like symptoms ( 2). However, it can progress to more severe disease and cause acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), organ failure, and death ( 3). In the absence of definite treatment, the disease has caused more than 500,000 deaths worldwide in nearly 6 months ( 4).
